overview: Juan Luis Suarez is the director of The CulturePlex (www,cultureplex.ca), the lab for the study of cultural complexity and digital humanities at the University of Western Ontario (Canada). In The CulturePlex he directs research content projects around different cultural and historical cases (mainly, the baroque and creativity), and also software development projects to close the gap between the humanities and the new (web) technologies. He is also a Co-Founder of Yutzu (www.yutzu.com), space for creative minds that helps collect content, collaborate with teammates, and communicate with people everywhere.
